last_episode_to_air.name: Imagination Man
last_episode_to_air.overview: Isaki arranges for a getaway car but runs into a snag. Otherwise, life goes on for everyone else.

name: The Fable
overview: A legendary hitman trained to become the world's best assassin is asked to lay low for a year by the head of his crime family.

episodes.name: Moving
episodes.overview: The invincible hitman, Fable, is ordered by the boss to live an ordinary life in Osaka for a year.

episodes.name: A Wonderful Night
episodes.overview: Akira and Yoko start their new life in Osaka, but trouble always seems to find them.

episodes.name: Tag
episodes.overview: Akira runs the risk of disobeying orders while minding his own business.

episodes.name: Chatting About Life
episodes.overview: Sparks fly between Akira, who wants to live in peace, and Ebihara, who wants the hitman out.

episodes.name: You Listening to Me?!
episodes.overview: In his quest to live an ordinary life, Akira begins the seemingly impossible task of finding a job.

episodes.name: Prison Release Jamboree
episodes.overview: Kojima becomes increasingly resentful at changes to the Maguro Group while he was in prison.

episodes.name: Realist
episodes.overview: With growing frustration, Kojima takes advantage of Ebihara's absence to make his move.

episodes.name: Because I'm...You know!
episodes.overview: Yoko sets her sights on a playboy womanizer who shows up at the bar where she hangs out.

episodes.name: You Mean a Hitman...?
episodes.overview: As Kojima's rampage escalates, Ebihara tries to get Akira to keep an eye on him.

episodes.name: The Phantom of the Balcony
episodes.overview: When Akira finds out that Misaki is in trouble, he goes into action to get her out of it.

episodes.name: The Fated Day
episodes.overview: Akira, Yoko, Kojima, and Sunagawa all prepare for what will be an explosive encounter.

episodes.name: There's Always Someone Better
episodes.overview: Hindered by his order not to kill, Akira still puts his rescue plan into motion.

episodes.name: Aniki...Aniki...
episodes.overview: Akira returns with Kojima, but now Ebihara faces a hard decision to keep the peace of the Group.

episodes.name: I Love You, Nii-san!
episodes.overview: Akira lets Kuroshio, who knows the truth about Fable, tag along for a two-night survival adventure.

episodes.name: Survival Traning?
episodes.overview: Akira and Kuroshio's survival adventure in the mountains drives Kuroshio to the edge of sanity.

episodes.name: Mountaineer Man
episodes.overview: One battleground, the woods, the other, a bar. Both will echo with sounds of fierce combat tonight.

episodes.name: Rei Utsubo
episodes.overview: From a Taihei detective agency, a dark force is at work, disturbing Akira's peaceful life.

episodes.name: Cheerio
episodes.overview: Utsubo and his associates approach Misaki as they proceed with their nefarious plans.

episodes.name: Lies and Falsehoods
episodes.overview: Akira finds out a surprising fact during a delivery, and Utsubo and his crew make their next move.

episodes.name: 24 Hours
episodes.overview: Utsubo exposes Kainuma's stalking, causing Kainuma to turn his ire on Misaki.

episodes.name: The ABCs of Villainy
episodes.overview: After discovering who Fable is, Utsubo begins working out a plan to kill Akira.

episodes.name: Doorstep Man
episodes.overview: Utsubo and Suzuki put into motion their carefully laid plans to kill Fable, their foe.

episodes.name: Horn
episodes.overview: Akira proves harder than expected to kill, and Utsubo runs into trouble preparing the next trap.

episodes.name: Starry Sky Lullaby
episodes.overview: Suzuki and Akira work desperately to save Hinako, and Utsubo puts his final plan into action.

episodes.name: Imagination Man
episodes.overview: Isaki arranges for a getaway car but runs into a snag. Otherwise, life goes on for everyone else.
